alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Izard; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 10:41PM CDT until November 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR STONE...EASTERN SEARCY...WESTERN IZARD...EASTERN VAN BUREN... WESTERN CLEBURNE...SOUTHEASTERN BAXTER...EASTERN CONWAY...NORTHERN FAULKNER AND NORTHWESTERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 1041 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Thola to Guy, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Heber Springs... Mountain View... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greenbrier... Calico Rock... Greers Ferry... Wooster... Quitman... Guy... Rose Bud... Damascus... Twin Groves... Menifee... Shirley... Pineville... Higden... Bethlehem... Hill Creek... Whipple... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and north central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Baxter; Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Izard; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren; White
